item.title: Cambridge hold Europe’s highest university fundraising total
item.author: Nikita Kesharaju,
item.description: Cambridge reached a milestone of US$2.0bn during its 800th Anniversary Campaign making it the university with the highest fundraising total in Europe. A mammoth US$905m (£523m) was raised by the university’s colleges and US$1.1bn (£649 million) was raised by the university itself. This 10 year …
